properties.areaDesc: Vermilion to Avon Point OH; Reno Beach to The Islands OH; Maumee Bay to Reno Beach OH; The Islands to Vermilion OH
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 18 at 3:34AM EST until January 18 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 35 knots with
gusts up to 45 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 knots with gusts up
to 35 knots and waves 2 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of central and western Lake Erie.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
